message: All have sinned and fallen short of the glory of God. Be careful what you wish on others...treat them as you wish to be treated. And treat God as more than just the man upstairs - He deserves our respect.

If you would like to report illegal aliens, please call Immigration and Customs Enforcement (ICE) at 1-866-DHS-2ICE (347-2423). They will need to know names, locations (either work place or residence) and any other specific information you can provide. Visit for more information.

Rubio looked like a high school freshman sweating and trying too hard to be funny. It was quite obvious the establishment is behind him hearing the audience applause. Rubio was sweating so bad that he looked like a sausage cooking in the microwave... a Cuban sausage. The moderators cutting the Cruzbot off was pure comedy, and a dose of reality. The reality is, it's over, Trump is destroying them in the polls and will blow them out on Super Tuesday. I'm sure some will say """"the USA Today poll shows Trump losing to Hillary, and Cruz beating Hillary"""", again Trump kicked the Cruzbot in nuts when he told him """"you're losing to me, that means you'll be destroyed by her"""". Trump is going to be the President of the United States. It's over.

Removing the electoral college would reduce the need for any candidate to campaign at all in low populations states, or if elected to even pay attention to problems those states have that should be addressed on a federal level. The electoral college was put in place to give low population states a seat at the table when it comes to electing presidents. The electoral college works and should never be removed.
